  • 方法详细资料

    • getAvailableMotorByType

      <T extends Motor> int getAvailableMotorByType(Class<T> motorClazz)
      This method returns the number of electric motorcycle of the specified type that are available to rent
      参数:
      motorClazz - the clazz of the subclass of Motor
      返回:
      the amount of specific availableMotor

    • getRentedMotorByClient

      Motor getRentedMotorByClient(Client client)
      Given a person, this method returns the electric motorcycle they are currently renting (if any).
      参数:
      client - the specific client

    • getRentedMotors

      List<Motor> getRentedMotors()
      This method returns a collection of all the electric motorcycle currently rented out (if any).
      返回:
      the list of being rented motors

    • issueMotorToClient

      boolean issueMotorToClient(Client client, License license, Motor motor)
      this method determines whether the person is eligible to rent a motorcycle of the specified type and, if there is a motorcycle available, issues an electric motorcycle of the specified type
      参数:
      client - specific client
      license - specific license
      motor - the type of motor
      返回:
      whether company can issue the motor to the client

    • canIssue

      int canIssue(Motor motor, Client client)
      according to client's info to decide whether can clients rent the motor
      参数:
      client -
      返回:
      0: yes 1: no license 2: multi rent 3: rentSmall should age >= 20 and license >= 1 year 4: rentLarge should age >= 25 and license >= 5 years

    • terminateRental

      int terminateRental(Client client)
      calculate the gap of battery level to max level
      参数:
      client -
      返回:
